programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Elaha
programme.desc: Elaha, a young Kurdish-German woman, battles patriarchy and family expectations while seeking her own path. Elaha struggles with traditions, marriage and virginity, and she must choose between emancipation or delusion.

programme.title: Murder At Land's End
programme.desc: A woman’s body is found washed up on a beach. Labelled as a murder case, it resembles a sinister, old Breton legend about the transportation of dead souls. Captain Meyer takes on the case but is instead intrigued by his mysterious partner, Captain Leroy.

programme.title: The Peace And Love Process
programme.desc: Marie and Simon, a couple with two children, are deeply in love despite constant fights in their paired life. To save their marriage, they come up with a chart of Ten Rules to seek love and peace.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Free Money
programme.desc: Based on true stories of the crypto and investment craze of the early 2020-ies. Crypto's allure, wealth's pursuit, and the lessons of a changing financial world collide in an intense journey of three interconnected lives - an unwitting Bitcoin holder, a crypto entrepreneur and a conservative banker.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Dangerous Gentlemen
programme.desc: The mountain retreat of Zakopane, 1914. Joseph Conrad and three notorious artists wake up after a crazy party with a dead man on their couch and not a clue who he is, why is he dead, and why the gendarmerie are knocking on their doors.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Leverage: Redemption S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Reformed criminals put their unique skills to good use by helping regular citizens fight back against corporate and governmental injustices.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune: Season 03 - EP 2
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23 - EP 10
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.desc: Beat Shazam is an interactive musical game show based on the Shazam app, in which teams compete against each other attempting to identify songs.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Dangerous Gentlemen
programme.desc: The mountain retreat of Zakopane, 1914. Joseph Conrad and three notorious artists wake up after a crazy party with a dead man on their couch and not a clue who he is, why is he dead, and why the gendarmerie are knocking on their doors.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine
programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: Binti
programme.desc: Faced with potential deportation as an immigrant, Binti, a 12-year-old vlogger plots a scheme with her new friend to bring their parents together to save her future.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Hunt For The Bosses
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Duisburg Mafia Murders in 2007. Late night, Antonio Russo leaves his restaurant with his nephew and employees. Suddenly two gunmen appear and open fire. Investigations lead to a village in Italy from which all victims originate.
